column5: I had an interesting conversation with a fellow co-worker who is over 40 and had these 3 important rules to pass on...thought everyone would get a kick out of them.   Rule #1  When you have to take a leak, go. And when you don't have to go, try anyway.....  Rule #2 NEVER EVER TRUST A FART  Rule #3 NEVER EVER WASTE GOOD WOOD!
Woulda worked when I wuz 30 too!
